headlines.headline: NBA trade tracker: Details for every deal of the 2025-26 season
headlines.description: Here's every trade of the 2025-26 season, including the Mavericks trading Anthony Davis to the Wizards.

headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Live updates, trades, rumors, intel on deadline day
headlines.description: Catch up on what we're hearing before the 3 p.m. ET trade deadline, with updates on Ivica Zubac, Giannis Antetokounmpo and more.

headlines.headline: Sources: Bucks don't feel pressure to trade Giannis Antetokounmpo
headlines.description: The Bucks don't feel the pressure to move Giannis Antetokounmpo on Thursday, team sources told ESPN hours ahead of the NBA's trade deadline.

headlines.headline: NBA trade grades: Porzingis, Kuminga, Davis, McCain, Paul deals
headlines.description: The Cavaliers, Celtics, Hawks, Mavericks and Warriors are among the teams that have made trades. We're grading every deal.

headlines.headline: JWill: I don't trust Porzingis' durability
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew examines whether Kristaps Porzingis can be difference-maker for the Warriors.

headlines.headline: JWill: The time is now for the New York Knicks
headlines.description: Jay Williams and Brian Windhorst agree that the Knicks have a chance to really make a push to become NBA champions.

headlines.headline: Does Stephen A. believe Drake Maye is playing with house money in Super Bowl LX?
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith doubles down on his take from earlier in the week that Drake Maye is playing with house money Sunday in the Super Bowl.

headlines.headline: Are Cam Jordan's comments about Josh Allen fair or foul?
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew breaks down whether Josh Allen can be trusted in big games in response to Cam Jordan's comments about the Bills quarterback.

headlines.headline: Fact or fiction: An updated look at the 'Madden curse' with Barkley's 2025 season
headlines.description: Is Barkley's latest season indicative of the long-alleged Madden curse, or was it a myth buster? We stacked his post-cover season up with fellow recent honorees.

headlines.headline: Woody, Saturday not buying Brady's impartiality ahead of SB LX
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew questions Tom Brady after the former Patriots star claimed he doesn't have "a dog in the fight" ahead of Super Bowl LX.

headlines.headline: Sixty bets for Super Bowl 60 to get you ready for Seahawks-Patriots
headlines.description: We navigated the thousands of bets being offered for Super Bowl LX and narrowed it down to our 60 favorite from 10 different categories.

headlines.headline: Super Bowl LX: Seahawks-Patriots matchup preview, prediction
headlines.description: Can Drake Maye hit enough big plays? Which Sam Darnold will show up? And will defense define this Super Bowl matchup? Let's go deep on Seahawks-Patriots.

headlines.headline: Olympic betting trends: The Lindsey Vonn dilemma, big money on hockey and... curling?
headlines.description: Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics, how are sportsbooks approaching Lindsey Vonn, men's hockey and... curling?

headlines.headline: NHL Awards Watch: Who's leading for Hart, Norris, Calder?
headlines.description: We polled PHWA voters to find out who's ahead in the major races as some new names have entered the conversation for the Hart and Vezina.

headlines.headline: Capitals and Predators hit the ice for non-conference matchup
headlines.description: Nashville Predators (26-23-7, in the Central Division) vs. Washington Capitals (28-23-7, in the Metropolitan Division)

headlines.headline: Kings visit the Golden Knights after Kuzmenko's 2-goal game
headlines.description: Los Angeles Kings (23-18-14, in the Pacific Division) vs. Vegas Golden Knights (26-16-14, in the Pacific Division)

headlines.headline: Lomberg scores tiebreaking goal in 3rd and Flames top scuffling Oilers 4-3 to take season series
headlines.description: — Matvei Gridin had a goal and an assist for the rookie's first multipoint game in the NHL, leading the Calgary Flames to a 4-3 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Wednesday night.

headlines.headline: Shane Wright's 2 goals lead Kraken to 4-2 victory over Kings
headlines.description: — Shane Wright scored twice to lead the Seattle Kraken to a 4-2 win over the Los Angeles Kings on Wednesday night.
